value:
I'm sure it was my mother—excuse
me, the goddess—who led me here.

Being the archbishop sometimes
requires me to judge rationally and
speak firmly.

Do you find this crown overstated?$k$pIt has been passed down from
archbishop to archbishop for
generations in the Church of Seiros.

If there is something on your mind,
do not hesitate to confide in me. I
wish to be a pillar of support for you.

Many gods and goddesses have come
down from the heavens to Askr. I feel
a strange sense of nostalgia here...

I am Rhea, archbishop of the Church
of Seiros. I am lending my aid to the
castle of $Nf.

I must be steadfast in mind and body
for the sake of my people.

Reflect on your deeds so you may set
yourself on the path to redemption.
Were my prayers not enough?

Such altruism is noble, indeed. May
this power aid us in bringing light to
the world.

I am Rhea, archbishop of the Church
of Seiros. I wish to bring the light of
hope to Fódlan and Askr alike.

Oh, Summoner. Are you on patrol, at
this time of night? Your dedication to
our safety is inspiring.$k$pI sense a certain quality in you... One
might call it great potential, a power
to shape the future.$k$pThis power you possess is what drew
me and the other Heroes of Fódlan to
this world.$k$pIt is your special gift, shared by none,
that combines our disparate powers
into one even greater force.$k$pI shall support you. When darkness
shrouds your path, do not hesitate to
call upon me.$k$pThe teachings of Seiros shall lead you
from peril into a future bathed in light
and shaped by love and connection.
Stand before her!
You have been judged.
In the name of the goddess.
Know your place.
How can this be?
I am called Rhea. I am the archbishop of the Church of Seiros.
No, you mustn't play such games.
Through the long history of Fódlan, an unending stream of those who threaten the peace flows.
You are doing quite well. I would advise you to be confident in your abilities.
May the sinful be punished in equal measure to their deeds.
Mother... One day...
Blessings of the goddess upon you.
Yes.
What shall I do?
Let us proceed.
